Arg.Name: Prefix
Arg.Description: An additional string which is added before the UUID.

Action.Name: Code.GetEventScript
Action.Description: Gets the script from the specific event of a page or dialog.

Arg.Name: Page or Dialog
Arg.Description: The name of the page or dialog containing the script.

Arg.Name: Event
Arg.Description: The event from which the code will be retrieved.

Action.Name: Code.GetObjectScript
Action.Description: Gets the script from the specific event of an object.

Arg.Name: Object
Arg.Description: The name of the object containing the script.

Arg.Name: Event
Arg.Description: The event from which the script will be retrieved.

Action.Name: Code.GotScriptFileSection
Action.Description: Executes the code in a script file from a declared section start point to the end of the section.

Arg.Name: File
Arg.Description: The name of the file containing the script.

Arg.Name: Section
Arg.Description: The name of the section of code to execute.

Action.Name: Code.GotoEventLine
Action.Description: Executes the code in a page/dialog from a specific point onward.

Arg.Name: Page or Dialog
Arg.Description: The name of the page or dialog containing the script.

Arg.Name: Event
Arg.Description: The name of the event in which the script will be executed.

Arg.Name: Line
Arg.Description: The number of the line at which to begin execution of the script.

Action.Name: Code.GotoEventSection
Action.Description: Executes the code in a page/dialog from a declared section start point to the end of the section.

Arg.Name: Page or Dialog
Arg.Description: The name of the page or dialog containing the script.

Arg.Name: Event
Arg.Description: The name of the event in which the script will be executed.

Arg.Name: Section
Arg.Description: The name of the section of code to execute.

Action.Name: Code.GotoObjectLine
Action.Description: Executes the code in an object from a specific point onward.

Arg.Name: Object
Arg.Description: The name of the object containing the script.

Arg.Name: Event
Arg.Description: The name of the event in which the script will be executed.

Arg.Name: Line
Arg.Description: The number of the line at which to begin execution of the script.

Action.Name: Code.GotoObjectSection
Action.Description: Executes the code in an object from a declared section start point to the end of the section.

Arg.Name: Object
Arg.Description: The name of the object containing the script.

Arg.Name: Event
Arg.Description: The name of the event in which the script will be executed.

Arg.Name: Section
Arg.Description: The name of the section of code to execute.

Action.Name: Code.GotoScriptFileLine
Action.Description: Executes the code in a script file from a specific point onward.

Arg.Name: File
Arg.Description: The name of the file containing the script.

Arg.Name: Line
Arg.Description: The number of the line at which to begin execution of the script.

Action.Name: Code.GotoScriptLine
Action.Description: Executes the code in a script string from a specific point onward.

Arg.Name: Script
Arg.Description: The name of the variable containing the script.

Arg.Name: Line
Arg.Description: The number of the line at which to begin execution of the script.

Action.Name: Code.GotoScriptSection
Action.Description: Executes the code in a script string from a declared section start point to the end of the section.

Arg.Name: Script
Arg.Description: The name of the variable containing the script.

Arg.Name: Section
Arg.Description: The name of the section of code to execute.

Action.ReturnValueDescription: Returns a string containing the UUID.

Arg.Note: Leave this blank or nil to exclude the prefix.

Action.ReturnValueDescription:
Returns a string containing the script from the specified page's/dialog's specific event.
If an error occurs then a blank string is returned.

Returns a string containing the script from the specified object's specific event.
If an error occurs then a blank string is returned.

Action.Note: Sections are declared in comments and use html/xml tag syntax.
Sections are declared in comments and use html/xml tag syntax.
Sections are declared in comments and use html/xml tag syntax.
Sections are declared in comments and use html/xml tag syntax.

Extended.Name: Code
Extended.Description: The Code Action Plugin allows for unconventional means of code manipulation by implementing a goto method as well as providing other functionality such as a UUID generation.
Extended.Author: Centauri Soldier
Extended.InstallNotes: Place the Code folder in your "AutoPlay Media Studio\Plugins\Action" folder.
